mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_no, m.upper_menu_no, m.menu_name, m.main_flag, m.delete_flag, m.menu_code, m.menu_path, menu_order, m.menu_default, m.depth, m.uuid, m.filename FROM tbl_menu m

SELECT m.menu_no, m.upper_menu_no, m.menu_name, m.main_flag, m.delete_flag, m.menu_code, m.menu_path, menu_order, m.menu_default, m.depth, m.uuid, m.filename FROM tbl_menu m
order by m.menu_order, m.menu_no

select m.upper_menu_no, um.menu_name as upper_menu_name, m.menu_no, m.menu_name, m.menu_code, m.main_flag, m.menu_order, m.uuid, m.filename from tbl_menu m left join tbl_menu um on um.menu_no = m.upper_menu_no
WHERE m.menu_code = #{menuCode} AND m.delete_flag = FALSE
WHERE m.menu_no = #{menuNo} AND m.delete_flag = FALSE
order by m.menu_order, m.menu_no

SELECT m.menu_no, m.depth, m.upper_menu_no, m.menu_name, m.menu_code, m.menu_path, m.uuid, m.filename, (SELECT COUNT(*) from tbl_menu WHERE upper_menu_no = m.menu_no) sub_menu_count from tbl_menu m
where m.upper_menu_no IS NULL AND m.delete_flag = FALSE
where m.upper_menu_no = #{menuNo} AND m.delete_flag = FALSE
order by m.menu_order, m.menu_no
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_menu (upper_menu_no, menu_name, main_flag, menu_code, menu_path, menu_required, menu_admin, menu_order, menu_default,depth, uuid, filename, reg_user, reg_date) VALUE (#{upperMenuNo}, #{menuName}, #{mainFlag}, #{menuCode}, #{menuPath}, #{menuRequired}, #{menuAdmin}, #{menuOrder}, #{menuDefault}, #{depth}, #{uuid}, #{filename}, #{regUser}, NOW()
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_menu SET uuid = #{uuid}, filename = #{filename}, mod_user = #{modUser}, mod_date = NOW()
UPDATE tbl_menu SET menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_order = #{menuOrder}, main_flag = #{mainFlag}, mod_user = #{modUser}, mod_date = NOW()
